main event: A civilian observed a star-like object that was a very bright white light in the sky on October 30, 1966.
interesting points: The object was initially observed coming from the West over a hill., The witness described the light as flickering with red and green colors., The sighting lasted about 10 minutes., The object moved slowly from Southwest to the West with slight up and down movement., The conclusion identified the object as Arcturus, a bright star.
